page.title: 09ATTITUDES
page.content: The majority of those asked said : The #1 note should be saved.Violence shown on TV is harmful.Policies of the present government are not the right ones at this time.Cannabis should not be legalised.Punk fashion is light- hearted/agressive.The police are not "wonderful" anymore.There are not sufficient educational opportunities for children today.High rise flats are not the answer to today's housing problems.We,as a nation,are becoming more sports conscious-but divided between being fiercely competitive and fun.The majority of children have too much pocket money.Space travel is an unnecessary expense.The Royal Family is an asset to the nation.Trade Union practices not attuned to present requirements.Modern technology will only improve the lot of the few who understand it.
